description: "Household Drawer Partition Underwear Organizer Manager Pink Household Drawer Partition is a kind of excellent drawer organizer ( drawer partition, drawer manager)Are you little boring about your drawer? when you mix all the small things in one drawer, tie, socks, underwear etc Drawer Organizer helps you organize your drawer Pink Drawer Manager is made of plastic material Length * Height: 37.2 x 6.6cm each piece Weight: 419.4g Package:1 Drawer Underwear Organizer(8 divider). 1.High Quality creative drawer partition or dividers that organize your messy drawer in minutes. 2.Easy to install and easy to use: Interlocks in seconds. 3.Multi-function separators that can be used in desk drawer, closet drawers, kitchen drawers or even trunk space. 4.They can be assembled and sized in different combinations to match your space.i"
